definition: relating to or characteristic of animals of the class Amphibia, cold-blooded vertebrate typically living on land but breeding in water
details:
adjective
- relating to or characteristic of animals of the class Amphibia
= synonyms: amphibious
noun
- cold-blooded vertebrate typically living on land but breeding in water
- an airplane designed to take off and land on water
= synonyms: amphibious aircraft
- a flat-bottomed motor vehicle that can travel on land or water
= synonyms: amphibious vehicle
